name: Kerr-Newman
data: \frac{2 \left(h \left(2 r \left(h-a^2 \sin ^2(\theta )\right)+2 a^2 r \sin ^2(\theta )\right)-2 a^2 \Delta  r \sin ^2(\theta )\right)}{\Delta  \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}-\frac{r}{\Sigma }

\frac{2 \left(h \left(2 r \left(h-a^2 \sin ^2(\theta )\right)+2 a^2 r \sin ^2(\theta )\right)-2 a^2 \Delta  r \sin ^2(\theta )\right)}{\Delta  \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}-\frac{r}{\Sigma }

-\frac{a \sin ^2(\theta ) \left(h \left(2 r \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)+4 h r\right)-2 \Delta  r \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+3 a^2+4 r^2\right)\right)}{\Delta  \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}

-\frac{a \sin ^2(\theta ) \left(h \left(2 r \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)+4 h r\right)-2 \Delta  r \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+3 a^2+4 r^2\right)\right)}{\Delta  \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}
\frac{2 a \left(2 r \left(h-a^2 \sin ^2(\theta )\right)+2 a^2 r \sin ^2(\theta )-2 \Delta  r\right)}{\Delta  \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}
\frac{2 a \left(2 r \left(h-a^2 \sin ^2(\theta )\right)+2 a^2 r \sin ^2(\theta )-2 \Delta  r\right)}{\Delta  \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}

\frac{2 \Delta  r \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+3 a^2+4 r^2\right)-a^2 \sin ^2(\theta ) \left(2 r \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)+4 h r\right)}{\Delta  \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}-\frac{r}{\Sigma }

\frac{a^2 \sin (\theta ) \cos (\theta )}{\Sigma }+\frac{\cot (\theta ) \left(a^4 \cos (4 \theta )+3 a^4-4 a^2 \Delta  \sin ^2(\theta )+4 a^2 r^2 \cos (2 \theta )+4 a^2 r^2+4 r^4\right)}{\left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}

\frac{2 \Delta  r \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+3 a^2+4 r^2\right)-a^2 \sin ^2(\theta ) \left(2 r \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)+4 h r\right)}{\Delta  \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}-\frac{r}{\Sigma }

\frac{a^2 \sin (\theta ) \cos (\theta )}{\Sigma }+\frac{\cot (\theta ) \left(a^4 \cos (4 \theta )+3 a^4-4 a^2 \Delta  \sin ^2(\theta )+4 a^2 r^2 \cos (2 \theta )+4 a^2 r^2+4 r^4\right)}{\left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)^2}
